# fullName

**Type Property**

A scope that includes the user’s full name.

## Declaration

```swift
static let fullName: ASAuthorization.Scope
```

## Scopes

- **email**: A scope that includes the user’s email address.

items.description: A scope that includes the user’s email address.
items.name: email
